sentences.en: "She's probably had a row with her boyfriend," Charles opined.
sentences.cn: “她大概跟男朋友吵架了，”查尔斯说道。

sentences.en: "Whatever is that row?" she demanded. "Pop festival," he answered.
sentences.cn: “那闹哄哄的究竟是在做什么？”她问道。“是流行音乐节，”他回答说。

sentences.en: A train rocketed by, shaking the walls of the row houses.
sentences.cn: 一辆火车疾驰而过，排屋的墙都摇晃起来。

sentences.en: After the row in a pub he drove off in a huff.
sentences.cn: 在酒吧里吵了一架后，他气鼓鼓地开车走了。

sentences.en: four chairs were set in a row.
sentences.cn: 四张椅子摆成一排。

sentences.en: He finished second in the championship four years in a row.
sentences.cn: 他连续4年获得锦标赛亚军。

sentences.en: He had just had a row with his wife.
sentences.cn: 他刚刚和妻子吵了一架。

sentences.en: He has been on Death Row for 11 years.
sentences.cn: 他已经在死囚区关了11年。

sentences.en: I had a real row with him. I tore into him.
sentences.cn: 我和他大吵一架，把他狠狠地数落了一顿。

sentences.en: I had the most almighty row with the waitress.
sentences.cn: 我和女招待大吵了一架。

sentences.en: If I'm inside for three days in a row, I go crazy.
sentences.cn: 如果连续3天不出来，我会发疯的。

sentences.en: Jenny used to row at college (= as a sport ) .
sentences.cn: 珍妮以前在大学里经常参加划船运动。

sentences.en: row upon row (= many rows ) of shelves stacked with books

sentences.en: She has had a flaming row with her lover.
sentences.cn: 她刚和恋人发生了激烈的争吵。

sentences.en: The Captain pulled rank and made his sergeant row the entire way.
sentences.cn: 上校倚仗权势让他的中士划船划了一路。

sentences.en: The ensuing row snarled up the work of the joint peace commission.
sentences.cn: 随后的争吵把联合和平委员会的工作搅得一团糟。

sentences.en: They had a huge row and Sally moved out of the house.
sentences.cn: 他们大吵一架之后萨莉搬了出来。

sentences.en: This political row threatens to grow into a full blown crisis.
sentences.cn: 这场政治争端有可能演化成一场全面爆发的危机。

sentences.en: We had a humongous row just before she left.
sentences.cn: 就在她离开之前，我们大吵了一架。
